description:
Opposition to climate action was rife at a recent conference in Budapest, Hungary, attended by key hard-right, nationalist figures from the UK, U.S., and Europe. The two-day event on 17 and 18 September, co-hosted by the Heritage Foundation, played host to high-ranking members of Viktor Orbán’s Hungarian government, executives from anti-green think tanks, and UK […]

The post Trump and Orbán Allies Gather at Anti-Green Event Hosted by Project 2025 Group appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Trump and Orbán Allies Gather at Anti-Green Event Hosted by Project 2025 Group

description:
Former Australian prime minister Tony Abbott has been stood down as a trade advisor by the new Labour government, DeSmog can reveal. Abbott is a trustee of the Global Warming Policy Foundation (GWPF), the UK’s leading climate science denial group, and has previously said that “climate change is probably doing good”. He was appointed as […]

The post Climate Denier Tony Abbott Dumped as Government Trade Advisor appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Climate Denier Tony Abbott Dumped as Government Trade Advisor
